member.name: T:TypeExtender.TypeExtender
member.summary: A class the creates/extends other unsealed classes/types at runtime

member.name: M:TypeExtender.TypeExtender.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a type extender object with the name of the derive class that will extend System.Object as the base class.

member.name: M:TypeExtender.TypeExtender.#ctor(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a type extender object with the name of the derived class and the base class the new class should derive from.

member.name: M:TypeExtender.TypeExtender.FetchType
member.summary: Returns the derived class containing all the properties and methods added to it

member.name: M:TypeExtender.TypeExtender.AddAttribute``1(System.Object[])
member.summary: Adds an attribute to the derived class

member.name: M:TypeExtender.TypeExtender.AddAttribute(System.Type,System.Object[])
member.summary: Adds an attribute to the derived class

member.name: P:TypeExtender.TypeExtender.TypeName
member.summary: Gets the name of the derived class

member.name: P:TypeExtender.TypeExtender.BaseType
member.summary: Gets the base class that the derived class extends
